exampleProjects.name: Cisco - Meraki - REST - Example
exampleProjects.overview: This Pre-Built Automation bundle contains several example use cases that are applicable when Itential Automation Platform is integrated with a Cisco Meraki controller using the REST API
exampleProjects.webName: Cisco Meraki Example Use Cases for Device Provisioning

adapters.name: adapter-meraki
adapters.configurationNotes: In order to run the workflows in this Pre-Built Automation, the adapter property choosepath must be added to the Meraki adapter configuration with value `"v1"`.

capabilities.capability: The workflow is used to claim a device into a network

inputs.name: networkId
inputs.description: The network ID to use for claiming devices

inputs.name: adapterId
inputs.description: The Meraki adapter instance to use in the job

inputs.name: serials
inputs.description: The list of devices to claim as denoted by serial number

outputs.name: claimNetworkDevicesResult
outputs.description: Result of successfully claiming devices to network

outputs.name: claimNetworkDevicesError
outputs.exampleValue: {   "icode": "AD.500",   "IAPerror": {     "origin": "meraki-connectorRest-handleEndResponse",     "displayString": "Error 400 received on request",     "recommendation": "Verify the request is accurate via debug logs and postman",     "code": 400,     "raw_response": {       "status": "success",       "code": 400,       "response": {         "errors": [           "Device with serial  not found"         ]       },       "redirects": 0,       "tripTime": "2649ms"     }   },   "response": {     "errors": [       "Device with serial  not found"     ]   } }
outputs.description: Result if failure claiming devices to network

relatedDocumentation.name: Claim Network Devices - Meraki
relatedDocumentation.description: Meraki API documentation for claiming network devices

name: Claim Network Devices - Meraki - REST
overview: This is a modular workflow that automates the process of claiming a new network device.
